title: Boakse
author: Boakse
created_time: June 12, 2023, 02:22:43 AMLast edit: September 10, 2023, 09:48:52 PM by Boakse
content: Looking for  2x  BFL Butterfly Labs Monarch miners for my collection.Monarchs must be in working condition!I found a half working broken one (for parts) , so only looking for 2x 100% working Monarchs right now.I know these miners are obsolete , however I would like 2 of these for my personal collection.If you only have one (working) Monarch please let me know, I can collect the next one over time (I hope)Last Try; 2x BFL Butterfly Labs Monarch miner working, 100 euro each!

comments.author: jimjam123
comments.body: Hey bro, I have have two of these. I haven't ran them in 6+ years, so just been sitting in storage.Not sure if they work anymore, but did when shut off.LMK if your interested. Tnx

comments.author: Boakse
comments.created_time: June 15, 2023, 10:48:48 PMLast edit: August 09, 2023, 12:26:13 AM by Boakse
comments.body: bumpTo bad the shipping costs from USA to EU are to high...However thanks jimjam123 for your reply!
